sentences.en: " Look, dummy ! He just stole second. Wake up! "
sentences.cn: 看哪!笨蛋! 被盗二垒了呀, 快清醒吧!

sentences.en: Answer my questions, Tom. Don't stand there looking like a stuffed dummy!
sentences.cn: 回答我的问题, 汤姆. 不要呆头呆脑地站在那里!

sentences.en: Don't just stand there, you dummy.
sentences.cn: 别在那儿干站着，你这个蠢货。

sentences.en: Dummy patrol cars will be set up beside motorways to frighten speeding motorists.
sentences.cn: 高速公路旁将安装仿真巡逻车以威慑那些超速驾车者。

sentences.en: He bumped many a dummy mine on his runs.
sentences.cn: 在他那几次航行中,他就撞上了好多个假水雷.

sentences.en: He looked like a ventriloquist's dummy.
sentences.cn: 他看上去像腹语术表演者用的人偶。

sentences.en: He was a dummy to agree.
Scrubbed , dressed, and fed, Dummy , as all the household called her, proved to be quite pretty.
sentences.cn: 全家人都管她叫小哑巴.她梳洗过,换了衣服, 吃了饭, 原来是个眉清目秀的姑娘.

sentences.en: Since a dummy index just indicates summation, it is immaterial which symbol is used.
sentences.cn: 由于哑指标只是表明求和, 所以它使用什么符号是无关重要的.

sentences.en: Soldiers were still using dummy weapons because real guns were not yet available.
sentences.cn: 士兵们还在用仿制的武器，因为还搞不到真家伙。

sentences.en: Sollozzo was no dummy and McCluskey was a very tough egg.
sentences.cn: 索洛佐不是人形靶,麦克罗斯基却是个砸不烂的顽石.

sentences.en: The dummy is no relation of ours.
sentences.cn: 这个哑巴又不和咱们沾亲带故.

sentences.en: The seamstresses cluck around a dummy, discussing a tuck here and there.
sentences.cn: 这些女裁缝围着模特儿衣架叽叽嘎嘎地讨论衣服这里或那里要做的小改动。

sentences.en: They asked her to put together a dummy for a new magazine.
sentences.cn: 他们让她为一本新杂志攒一份小样。

phrases.tran_cn: （主要指橄榄球及英式足球）以假传球（或踢球）动作来迷惑某人

trans.tran_cn: 假的，摆样子的，做样品的，挂名的，虚设的
trans.tran_en: a dummy tool, weapon, vehicle etc is made to look like a real one but you cannot use it

trans.tran_cn: 仿制品，沉默寡言的人，笨蛋，蠢货，挂名代表，傀儡
trans.tran_en: If you call a person a dummy, you mean that they are stupid or foolish
